modal.subtitle: Sign in to save your favorite links and access them anytime you want.
home.title: WhizzLink: Shorten, Transform, Conect
home.subtitle.link: Transform Your Long URL into a Sleek, Manageable Link
home.subtile.qr: Elevate your link-sharing with a single click by transforming any URL into a sleek QR code, instantly ready for scanning.
home.text: Unlock the power of open-source technology to swiftly create and manage short URLs or QR codes with just a click. Experience a fast, secure, and intuitive platform that simplifies your digital interactions.
home.notLogged.title: Unlock Your Creations!
home.notLogged.text: Sign in now to access and manage all your saved links and QR codes. Experience the convenience of having your personalized dashboard at your fingertips. Don't miss out on this exclusive feature: sign in and take full control of your digital content today. Your journey to effortless organization starts here
